name: me.DanL.FugitiveApp
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.update: npm run update-cfgmgen && npm install && npm run patch-blp
scripts.patch-blp: cd ./platforms/android/app/src/main/java/com/marianhello/bgloc/provider; sed 's/locationManager.getBestProvider(criteria, true)/"gps"/g' RawLocationProvider.java > RawLocationProvider2.java; mv RawLocationProvider2.java RawLocationProvider.java

author: Apache Cordova Team
